original_text: And the angel of the Lord said unto Manoah, Though thou detain me, I will not eat of thy bread: and if thou wilt offer a burnt offering, thou must offer it unto the Lord. For Manoah knew not that he was an angel of the Lord.
korean_text: 여호와의 사자가 마노아에게 이르되 네가 비록 나를 머물게 하나 내가 네 음식을 먹지 아니하리라 번제를 준비하려거든 마땅히 여호와께 드릴지니라 하니 이는 그가 여호와의 사자인 줄을 마노아가 알지 못함이었더라

sentences.original_text: And the angel of the Lord said unto Manoah
I will not eat of thy bread
and if thou wilt offer a burnt offering
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만약 당신이 번제물을 드리고자 한다면

sentences.original_text: thou must offer it unto the Lord
that he was an angel of the Lord
